snippet.title: Software Licensing, 2001
snippet.description: We were going to run this even before Ledge Kindred submitted it. Cem Kaner of Badsoftware.com has written a nice piece detailing the problems with UCITA, the new law which is being proposed across the United States and which will have terrible effects on the rights of software consumers.

snippet.title: Interview: The L0pht Answers
snippet.description: This week's "main" interview guest is L0pht Heavy Industries as a group. (We hope to have answers from Linux International head Jon "maddog" Hall tomorrow). Many insightful questions for the L0pht guys were posted Monday. Today, lots of insightful answers on everything from political controls on the Internet to hardware hacking. (Click below to read.)
